data.title: DINOSAUR
data.meta_description: Nino returns home after her mother’s funeral and finds herself completely alone. She is forty years old and all her life she lived with her mother. And now mother is dead. Nino doesn’t want to accept this new condition.
data.text:
Margo Zubashvili

Margo Zubashvili was born in 1991, Tbilisi, Georgia. She has graduated from The Shota Rustaveli Theatre and Film Georgian state University in 2014. Her first short film OLYMPIA was awarded in Georgia at Tbilisi Student film Festival Amirani and in Poland at the film school festival Mediaschool 2011. Margo is working in film production in Georgia from the first years of her studying. She has worked on successful Georgian projects such as IN BLOOM by Nana Ekvtimishvili and LINE OF CREDIT by Salome Alexi. She is also working at Tbilisi International Film Festival from 2010. DINOSAUR is her diploma work. In 2015 Margo Zubashvili won the competition on financing short-length feature film for the 2015 production at Georgian National Film Center with her new project ANA.
